products.name: Agathon, the Voice in the Darkness

characterabilities.name: Cull Soul
characterabilities.description: This model gains soul tokens from living enemy models that are destroyed within 2" of this model. After this model replenishes focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus/fury/essence point.

characterabilities.name: Revelations of the Outer Darkness
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when a friendly Faction non-soulless warrior model in this model's CMD range is destroyed by an enemy attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can cast a spell without spending essence.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [Unlimited Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. There is no limit to how many soul tokens it can carry.

feat.name: Well of Sorrow
feat.description: When an enemy model casts a spell while in Agathon's Control range, increase the COST of the spell by 1. Additionally, while in Agathon's Control range, models gain one additional die on their magic accuracy and damage rolls. You choose a die to discard in each roll. Well of Sorrow lasts for one round.

execution.name: Apparition
execution.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

ability.name: Dark Banishment [d6+3”]
ability.description: When this model hits an enemy model with this weapon during its activation, after the attack is resolved you can warp the enemy model anywhere completely within d6+3” of its currently location. A model can be warped by Dark Banishment only once per turn.

ability.name: Puncture
ability.description: On a direct hit, all models hit automatically suffer 1 damage point.

spells.name: Censure
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells in this spellcaster's Control Range immediately expire. A model can keep any of its upkeep spells in play by suffering d3 damage points per spell. Roll a separate d3 for each spell. Thai damage cannot be transferred or reduced by spending focus points. Remove one damage point from the spellcaster for each damage point caused by Censure. Censure can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Curse of Shadows
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 ARM. A model can advance through an affected model if it has enough movement to move completely past its base.

spells.name: Dark Seduction
spells.description: Take Control of target enemy non-leader warrior model. You can immediately make a full advance with that enemy model followed by a basic attack, then Dark Seduction expires. The enemy model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. Dark Seduction can be cast only once per activation. A model can be affected by Dark Seduction only once per turn.

spells.name: Hellfire
spells.description: Models disabled by Hellfire cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by Hellfire are removed from play.

spells.name: Hellmouth
spells.description: If this attack misses, nothing happens. If it hits, before making the damage roll, push models within 3" of the model hit 3" directly toward it in the order you choose. Then center a 3" AOE on the model hit. Models hit suffer a POW 12 damage roll. Models boxed by Hellmouth are removed from play.

spells.name: Occultation
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Model/Unit gains Stealth. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: Warp the spellcaster anywhere completely within 6" of its current location, then its activation ends.

spells.name: Tether
spells.description: Immediately after the spellcaster ends it's Normal Movement, target cohort model in it's battlegroup can advance up to 3" directly toward it.

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Legion of Everblight]
characterabilities.description: If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Legion of Everblight Cohorts can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Legion of Everblight units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Legion of Everblight Solos as well. While this model is in play friendly Soulless models gain Serenity.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Infernals]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Infernals armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Ritual Slaughter
characterabilities.description: Once during each of your turns when another friendly Blighted Ogrun model destroys an enemy model with an attack while in this model's Control Range, immediately after the attack is resolved, this model can cast a spell without spending fury. This model can spend fury to boost accuracy and damage rolls on spells cast as a result of Ritual Slaughter.

characterabilities.name: Snacking
characterabilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

feat.name: Field of Bones
feat.description: While in Anamag's Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Dark Shroud and their melee weapons gain Grievous Wounds. Field of Bones lasts for one turn. (While within 2" of a model with Dark Shroud, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.) (A model hit by a weapon with Grievous Wounds loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.)

execution.name: Scutter [Ogrun] (★Action)
execution.description: RNG 3". Target friendly Ogrun. If the Ogrun is in range, it gains Reposition [3"].

ability.name: Man Catcher
ability.description: A warrior model hit by this attack suffers -2 DEF and cannot advance while within the model's melee range.

spells.name: Bond of Gristle & Bone
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Feign Death. (A model with Feign Death cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks while knocked down.).

spells.name: Carnage
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to melee attack rolls against enemy models in the spellcaster's Control Range. Carnage lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Fury's Strength
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 to it's melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Gallows
spells.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, it can be pushed d6" directly toward Gallows' point of origin.

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

characterabilities.name: Detox (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Remove any number of juice tokens from this model.

characterabilities.name: Health Care
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer damage from Juicer while it has two or fewer juice tokens on it and is in Little Alyce's CMD range.

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Crucible Guard Cohorts can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Crucible Guard units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Crucible Guard Solos as well. While this model is in play friendly Soulless models gain Serenity.

characterabilities.name: Irregulars [Alyce Marc]
characterabilities.description: Alyce Marc units can be included in any army that also includes Lukas 1.

characterabilities.name: Juicer
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, you can place one juice token on di Morray. For each juice token on di Morray, he gains +1 ARC and AAT. At the end of each of his activations , roll a d6. If the result is equal to or less than the number of juice tokens on Di Morray, he suffers 1 damage point for each juice token on him. Di Morray cannot spend focus to reduce this damage.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Crucible Guard, Llael]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Crucible Guard, Llael armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Rapid Healing
characterabilities.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, immediately after the attack is resolved remove d3 damage points from it.

feat.name: Juiced Up
feat.description: Di Morray immediately gains one juice token and 1 focus point, then warjacks in his battlegroup currently in his Control range gain 1 focus point. Additionally, di Morra gains Range Amplifier this activation. (When a model with Range Amplifier casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +5 RNG)

execution.name: Quick Work
execution.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

ability.name: Exothermic Reaction
ability.description: When this attack boxes a living or undead model, center a 4" AOE on the boxed model, then remove the model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 12 fire damage roll and suffer the Continuous Fire effect. This damage is not considered to have been caused by an attack. This model is not affected by Exothermic Reaction.

spells.name: Burning Ash
spells.description: Place a 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffers -2 to attack rolls. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.name: Disintegration
spells.description: The model hit suffers -2 ARM for one round. A model boxed by Disintegration is removed from play.

spells.name: Force Hammer
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spells.name: Iron Flesh
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Blast Resistance. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: Warp target model completely within 2" of its current location. When Telekinesis targets an enemy model, it is an offensive spell and requires a magic attack roll. A model can be warped by telekinesis only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Dual Shot
characterabilities.description: If this model uses its Normal Movement to aim, it can make one additional ranged attack this activation.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [True Sight]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain True Sight. (A model with True Sight ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.)

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Cygnar Cohorts can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Cygnar units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Cygnar Solos as well. While this model is in play friendly Soulless models gain Serenity.

characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Infernals armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

feat.name: Firing Squad
feat.description: Friendly Faction models gain boosted Ranged Accuracy rolls while in this models Control range, additionally models in this model's battlegroup can make one additional ranged attack during their activations regardless of their ROF. Firing Squad lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Evasive
execution.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Blast
subabilities.description: This attack becomes AOE 3.

subabilities.name: Smoke 'em If You Got 'em
subabilities.description: Replace enemy living or undead models destroyed by a Smoke 'em If You Got 'em attack with 3” AOE cloud effects that remain in play for one round. Models destroyed by this attack are removed from play.

subabilities.name: Ward Breaker
subabilities.description: When resolving this attack, this weapon gains Blessed.

spells.name: Deadeye
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on each model's first non-spray tanged attack roll this turn.

spells.name: Fire Group
spells.description: While models in the spellcaster's battlegroup are in its Control Range, their ranged weapons gain +2 RNG. Fire Group lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Refuge
spells.description: At the end of an activation in which target friendly Faction model hit an enemy model with an attack, the affected model can make a full advance.

spells.name: Return Fire
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one round.

spells.name: Twister
spells.description: The AOE is a cloud effect that remains in play for one round.

characterabilities.name: Dark Rituals
characterabilities.description: This model can channel spells through friendly Faction warrior models in its Control Range. Immediately after a spell is channeled through a model as a result of Dark Rituals, the model it was channeled through suffers d3 points of Arcane damage.

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Skorne]
characterabilities.description: If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Skorne Cohorts can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. While this model is in play friendly Soulless models gain Serenity.

characterabilities.description: When this model suffers a damage roll, roll one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Skorne]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Skorne armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Plague Wind
feat.description: While in Rasheth's Control range, enemy models suffer -2 STR, DEF and ARM. When a living model is destroyed in his Control range, Rasheth can remove 1 damage point. Plague Wind lasts for one round.

execution.name: Opulence of House Telaar
execution.description: On the first turn of the game, this model gains Reposition [4"].

spells.name: Blood Mark
spells.description: Target enemy model suffers -2 ARM. The spellcaster can transfer damage from an enemy attack to the affected model one time, then Blood Mark expires.

spells.name: Breath of Corruption
spells.description: Models hit suffer a POW 12 corrosion damage roll. This spell's AOE is a cloud effect and hazard that remains in play for one round. Models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer 1 point of corrosion damage.

spells.name: Carnivore
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to melee attack rolls against living models. When an affected model destroys a living model with a melee attack, the destroyed model is removed from play and the spellcaster can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Castigate
spells.description: Enemy models cannot be used to channel spells or be forced to cast an animus while in the spellcaster's Control Range. Castigate lasts for one round.

spells.name: Influence
spells.description: Take Control of target enemy non-Leader warrior model. The model immediately makes one basic attack, then Influence expires. A model can be affected by Influence only once per turn.

spells.name: Sunder Spirit
spells.description: An enemy warbeast damaged by Sunder Spirit loses its animus for one round.

characterabilities.description: If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Protectorate of Menoth Cohorts can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Flameguard models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Whip the Flames
characterabilities.description: Models suffering the Fire continuous effect while in this model's Control range suffer -2 to accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Scorched Earth
feat.description: Enemy models currently in Feora's Control range suffer the Continuous Fire effect. Friendly warjack models can charge or power attack slam enemy models suffering the Continuous Fire effect without spending a focus point. Scorched Earth lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Ashen Veil
execution.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

spells.name: Dauntless Resolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +3 ARM and Tough.

spells.name: Engine of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Fire Step

spells.description: When an enemy model declares it is casting a spell while in this model's Control Range, the enemy spellcaster immediately suffers d3 damage points. If the enemy spellcaster is destroyed as a result of this damage, the spell does not take effect. Hex Hammer lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Incite
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to attack and damage rolls against enemy models while the enemy models are in the spellcaster's command range. Incite lasts for one turn.

feat.name: Wildfire
feat.description: Feora gains 1 focus point for each enemy model currently in her Control range suffering the Continuous Fire effect and can immediately give that focus to warjacks in her battlegroup that are in her Control range. Feora can then remove the Continuous Fire effect from any number of models in her Control range. For each Continuous Fire effect Feora removes, choose one model in her Control range to suffer the Continuous Fire effect.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Blazing Wrath]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Blazing Wrath.

spells.name: Cleansing Fire
spells.description: Cleansing Fire causes fire damage. On a critical hit models suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.name: Ember Spark
spells.description: Gain an additional die on this spell's accuracy roll if the target is not affected by Continuous Fire. Ember Spark causes fire damage. Models hit suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.name: Escort
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2' movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3' of it.

spells.description: Target a model in the spellcaster's battlegroup. That model's melee and ranged weapons gain Continuous fire.
